scripts.svgo: svgo bridge3-super-wider-qr-Large/*.svg -o min-bridge3-super-wider-qr-Large/ --disable removeXMLNS,removeViewBox --enable removeDimensions && svgo bridge3-super-wider-qr-4colour-Large/*.svg -o min-bridge3-super-wider-qr-4colour-Large/ --disable removeXMLNS,removeViewBox --enable removeDimensions
